a000_presentation:
This is the first sentence to translate.
Please use the text field bellow to write your translated text.

You can use buttons to:
Back and review your translation.
Same to use the same text to your language.
Next to apply your translated text and move forward.

Use Enter (Return) to a new line.
Some texts don't accept special characters.
Others have punctuation or nothing.

Let's start! Thank you.
b000_bugGeneral:
Found a bug, sorry.

Review your guides or script version, please.
e000_guideNotFound: Guide not found in this scene.
e001_guideNotChecked: Guide(s) not found in the respective folder...
e002_matrixPluginNotFound: The matrixNodes plugin not found, could not continue to create the mirror.
e003_moreThanOneGeo:
It is not possible create the Skinning!
Sorry.

There are more than one object
with the same name
in the list of Geometries.

Try to use the option:
Display Long Name,
please.

Here's the problem:
e004_objNotExist:
The item specified doesn't exists.

Here's the problem:
e005_selectOneObj: Select more then one object, please
e006_firstSkinnedGeo: Select first a skinned geometry, please.
e007_notSkinFound: There isn't a skinCluster in the first selected geometry.
e009_failDownloadUpdate:
Can't download the update file, sorry.

Check your internet connection
or permission to save in the folder

https://github.com/nilouco/dpAutoRigSystem/zipball/master/
e010_failInstallUpdate:
Can't install the update, sorry.

Check your internet connection
or try to do it manually
downloading from GitHub the new version.

https://github.com/nilouco/dpAutoRigSystem/zipball/master/
e011_notSelShape: Nothing is selected to add or replace shapes, sorry.
e012_cantLoadRibbon: Can't load jcRibbon extension in order to create bend in Limb module, sorry.
e013_cantLoadIkSpringSolver:
Can't load ikSpringSolver plugin, sorry.
Applied default ikRPSolver instead.
e014_cantLoadQuatNode:
Can't load QuatNode plugin, sorry.
Applied default Limb instead.
e015_selectToCopyAttr: Select one object to copy attributes, please.
e019_notFoundAllGrp: Not found All_Grp to select controls, sorry.
e020_notFoundHeadCtrl: Head Deformer created, but not found Head_Ctrl to parenting, sorry.
e021_cantLoadSoftIk: Can't load dpSoftIk extension in order to create the softIk setup in Limb module, sorry.
i005_footerRigging: modules will be created in this Rig
i006_aboutDesc:
About dpAutoRig System:

This script is a Python program to
automate the Rigging process.

It was write in order to help you to develop
many types of rigs by yourself.
Its arquitecture is modular, multilingual and object oriented
that means you can create any type of Rigging parts
and combine them as you want...

If you have any suggestion or comment, please contact me.
I hope you enjoy it   :)

It is FREE !!!
i007_authorDesc:
Author: Danilo Pinheiro (nilouco)

He's a simple person who likes 3D
and really want the best of all...

Contact information:
e-mail: nilouco@gmail.com
portfolio: https://nilouco.blogspot.com

Please, any feedback will be very appreciated   :)

Thank you very much!
i008_errorUI: Cannot load dpAutoRig UI window..., please try save the dpAutoRigSystem folder in MAYA_PATH directory and verify if you did not changed any file.
i012_idiomsDesc:
Idioms Information:

This script has multilanguage setup.
Just need choose you language in the menu.
To create a new language,
you can use the .json files
in the Languages directory,
duplicate one of them and rename it to your language and
translate the values of the dictionary
(but do not change the values of the keys in left side).

Otherwise, just use the dpTranslator in the Create menu.
i015_success: guide module was rigged with success
i016_success: guide modules were rigged with success
i017_nothing: Not found guides to Rig, sorry.
i021_rigAllDesc:
RIGGING existing modules
integrating them together
(if integrate option is on).
i033_notMasterGrp: Not found masterGrp. Please select a Master_Ctrl in order to find one.
i034_notSelHeadDef: Select objects to create Head Deformer, usually we create in the final head model vertices.
i039_notMatchDif: Sorry, could not do MatchMesh in different meshes.
i040_notMatchSel: Select the FROM and TO meshes or polygon transforms, please.
i044_origDesc: Load the Original Model here in order to be duplicated from it.
i048_addDesc: Add selected objects to target list.
i050_clearUndoDesc: Clear Undo in order to calculate faster (recommended).
i051_removeDesc: Remove selected objects from target list.
i055_tgtSelect: Please, select any geometry in order to add it in the mirror list.
i059_selTransform: Select the transform node instead of
i061_notExists: does not exists, maybe it was deleted, sorry.
i069_notSkinJoint: The listed joints bellow doesn't exists anymore:
i070_continueSkin: Do you want to continue the Skinning without those joints?
i085_updated:
The current version is up to date.

Nothing to do, thanks.
i087_rawURLFail:
Can't reach remote file, sorry.

Check with Develop Team to know
if the remote raw file url is correct, please.
i088_internetFail: Fail: check your internet connection, please.
i127_guideVersionDif:
Found guide version different
of this current dpAutoRigSystem.

Maybe it could build module with
unexpected results.

Do you want to continue?
i128_optionDegree: Create guides using this curve degree.
i134_rememberPublish:
Remember to publish it on GitHub as a Collaborator
or send the json file to a dpAutoRigSystem Developper
in order to integrate it and share:

Danilo Pinheiro - nilouco@gmail.com
i135_existingName: Are you sure to overwrite an existing file?
i152_noSpecialChar: Don't use special character for this type of sentence, please.
i161_historyMessage:
Maybe, your model could have some
undesirable deformation.

This will propagate in the copied targets.

You need to delete history of your model before.

Are you sure to continue?
i163_sameName: Can't continue because there's another node with the same name, sorry.
i166_collabDesc:
Here we have a list of
great persons who helped us
to develop this script.

Thanks to:
i168_donateDesc:
dpAutoRigSystem is a Free and Open Source
Python script shared to community.

If you want to support the development
you can donate using PayPal.

Thank you!
i172_updateManual:
If the automatic update doesn't work well,
download the last version and replace
the files manually, please. Thanks!
i173_reloadScript:
Reload the script, please.
We hope you enjoy it.
i177_chooseMessage: What kind of guides would you like to create?
i182_facialMessage: Do you want use it for?
i188_selectEdges: Select polygon edges to build Zipper curves, please.
i191_selectPoly: Select a polygon geometry to load, please.
i192_notUndoable:
Attention:

This script isn't undoable, sorry.

We recommend save your scene before run.
i197_mirrorAll: Do you want to mirror calibration for all controls?
i202_noControls: Nothing was done because there aren't dpControls in the file.
i203_noFolderFile: Not found folder or file to work with, sorry.
i206_removeNamespace: Found imported guide. Would you like to delete the namespace?
i228_fDriveAnn:
Drive letter used in the pipeline.
Like R:
i229_fStudioAnn:
Studio name, usually as R:/StudioName
where we write just the StudioName here.
i230_fProjectAnn:
Project name, usually as R:/StudioName/ProjectName
where we write just the ProjectName here.
i231_fWipAnn:
Work in Progress folder for the rigging files in construction.
Usually as R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Rigging/WIP
where we write just Rigging/WIP here.
i232_fPublishAnn:
Publish folder to export the published rig file.
Like R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Rigging/Published for example.
We can write just Rigging/Published here.
i233_fToClientAnn:
Folder where we store the compressed published file
and the generated rigging preview image to send them to the client.
Usually it is R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Data/ToClient
then we can write Data/ToClient here, for example.
i234_sPresetsAnn:
Where in the pipeline we can find the stored validators presets.
The path should be the same as the PipelineInfo.json file.
i235_sAddOnsAnn:
Where in the pipeline we can find the stored validators addOns.
The path should be the same as the PipelineInfo.json file.
i236_sHistAnn:
The folder to archive the old wip rig versions.
It uses the same wip path as its subfolder, inside of the dpData directory.
i237_sOldAnn:
The name of the folder where we backup the old published files.
It's a published subfolder.
i238_sDropboxAnn:
This is the folder name inside of the Dropbox base folder
where we create the StudioName/ProjectName subfolder
in order to put there the compressed published file.
i239_sPrefixAnn:
The prefix to use when renaming the published file.
Like this:
(Prefix + AssetName + Middle + Suffix + Version)
i240_sMiddleAnn:
Middle name to use when renaming the published file.
Like this:
(Prefix + AssetName + Middle + Suffix + Version)
i241_sSuffixAnn:
The suffix to use when renaming the published file.
Like this:
(Prefix + AssetName + Middle + Suffix + Version)
i242_sModelAnn: The name part to search the model version in the rig filename.
i243_sRigAnn: The version part to define the rig version in the filename.
i245_iPaddingAnn: Number padding to use in the versionning.
i246_bCaptalizeAnn: Change the filename to use the first letter as major.
i247_bUpperAnn: Change the filename to use UPPERCASE.
i248_bLowerAnn: Change the filename to use lowercase.
i249_bDeliverAnn:
If we want to export the published file into compressed, image preview, etc
into folders to deliver to the client.
Like for example R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Data/ToClient
i250_bDateDirAnn:
If we want to create a subfolder like the today date
into the delivery path like R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Data/ToClient/YYYY-MM-DD
i251_bAssetDirAnn:
If we use the AssetName as a subfolder inside of the WIP folder,
like R:/StudioName/ProjectName/Rigging/WIP/AssetName
i252_bArchiveAnn: If we want to put the old wip rig files into the dpData/dpOld folder, for example.
i253_bZipAnn:
If we want to compress the published file to save it into
the delivery folder like R:/StudiName/ProjectName/Data/ToClient/YYYY-MM-DD
i254_bCloudAnn: If we want to export the published file in the cloud folder, like Dropbox, for example.
i255_bImagerAnn: If we want to generate a screen grab image of the published file.
i256_biVersionAnn: Write the dpAutoRigSystem version in the image preview
i257_biStudioAnn: Write the studio name in the image preview
i258_biProjectAnn: Write the project name in the image preview
i259_biAssetAnn: Write the asset name in the image preview
i260_biModelAnn: Write the model version in the image preview
i261_biRigAnn: Write the wip rig version in the image preview
i262_biPublishAnn: Write the publish version in the image preview
i263_biDateAnn: Write the date of today in the image preview, like YYYY-MM-DD.
i264_biDegradeAnn: Generate the image preview using a degrade in the background.
i265_mirrorShapeAll: Do you want to mirror the control's shapes for all nodes?
i269_biMaya: Write the Maya version in the image preview
i273_runAllNodes: Do you want to run for all nodes?
i277_sWebhookAnn: This is the Discord Webhook URL to track the log.
i280_iAgreeTermsCond: I agree to terms and conditions.
i282_termsCondDesc:
Welcome to the Terms and Conditions
of this open source Maya rigging script,
provided as a free tool to assist the community.
By utilizing this tool, the user agrees to strive
for a high-quality rig and to always
show respect to other professionals. We believe
in creating a beautiful and harmonious world
in which to work and live. This tool is
available for personal, educational, or professional use.
Please note that for statistical purposes,
certain information may be collected, such as geolocation,
file name, computer or user name, for example.
However, this information will never be shared
with third parties and will solely
be used to improve the functionality of the tool.
Thank you for using our rigging tool,
and we hope it assists you in creating even better work.
i284_sCallbackAnn:
Callback this Python code init method after
finish the publishing.
It's useful to run next process in the pipeline.
i285_alreadySkinned: The geometry is already skinned, sorry.
i288_copySkinDesc:
It'll copy the skinning from
the first selected and skinned geometry
to the other selected meshes.
i289_sameNameSkinDesc:
It'll copy the skinning of meshes with the same name.
It's very useful to update the models in the rig.
i293_sModelIOAnn: The folder to export and import models.
i294_sShaderIOAnn: The folder to export and import shaders.
i295_sGuideIOAnn: The folder to export and import guides.
i296_sControlShapeIOAnn: The folder to export and import controller shapes.
i297_sSkinningIOAnn: The folder to export and import the skinnning weights.
i299_notUniqueName: Not unique name for this node
i300_sParentingIOAnn: The folder to export and import parent data.
i302_sSupportNodeIOAnn: The folder to export and import geometries used in the setup.
i308_toReplaceDPData:
Select the data to replace
in this current asset:
i309_sBlendShapeIOAnn: The folder to export and import blendShape target data.
i310_sDeformationIOAnn: The folder to export and import node deformers data.
i311_sInputOrderIOAnn: The folder to export and import defomer order data.
i312_sTransformationIOAnn: The folder to export and import transformations data.
i316_rivetNotFine: At least one of the selected items already has a rivet, would you like to remove then before create the new one (high recommended).
i320_rivetHeldGeo: The geometry that held the rivet(s)
i321_noConnectionGeo: does not have any connections left, would you like to remove it?
i323_sRivetIOAnn: The folder to export and import rivet data.
i324_sCalibrationIOAnn: The folder to export and import calibration data.
i325_sAttributeIOAnn: The folder to export and import attribute data.
i326_sComponentTagIOAnn: The folder to export and import componentTag data.
i327_sConnectionIOAnn: The folder to export and import connections data.
i328_sConstraintIOAnn: The folder to export and import constraints data.
i330_sDrivenKeyIOAnn: The folder to export and import set driven key nodes data.
i337_sUtilityIOAnn: The folder to export and import utility nodes data.
i338_sRenameIOAnn: The folder to export and import renamed node data info.
i345_sOffsetMatrixIOAnn: The folder to export and import parent offset matrix conection data.
i347_sChannelIOAnn: The folder to export and import the transform channelBox attribute states data.
i348_triangleIconAnn: Collapse or expand all module frame layouts.
i349_alreadyExistsAsset:
Already exists this asset name in the pipeline.
Please select another name or just load this one.
i350_notFoundPipeInfoFile: Not found dpPipelineInfo.json file to setup the asset data, sorry.
i351_notFoundWIPAssets: Not found WIP asset files to load, sorry.
i352_notFoundWIPPath:
Not found WIP asset path to load, sorry.
Please set your project pipeline.
If you want, you can use the Create - Pipeliner menu.
i353_sFinishingAnn:
Where in the pipeline we can find the stored validators to finishing.
The path should be the same as the PipelineInfo.json file.
i355_uniqueNameDependence:
It seems we have some nodes with duplicated names in the scene.
Some modules depend on unique names and may fail.

Do you want to continue anyway?
i356_sVisibilityIOAnn: The folder to export and import visibility data.
i357_putInfoFilePathHere: Put the path of your pipeline folder info here
m002_fkLineDesc:
Fk Line Module Description:

This module creates a joint chain
with the number of joints desired.

When rigged, the controls will be FK (forward kinematics).

This is useful to create tails, ears, hairs
or simple controls to objects.
m008_fingerDesc:
Finger Module Description:

This module creates a rig for fingers.
You can choose the number of falanges.

When rigged, the falange controls will be FK (forward kinematics),
and the main control will have the attributes to
display the falange controls, and also to rotate them.
You can use as IK too (inverse kinematics).
m012_spineDesc:
Spine Module Description:

This module creates a spine rig
using ribbon system to be more flexible.
You can choose the number of middle controls.

If integrated to other modules,
will receive parent information from Limbs and Head.
m018_headDesc:
Head Module Description:

This module creates a head and neck rig
integrated or no with the father module.
There is the functionality of the head follows the chest.
This module also include a jaw and chin controls.
m020_limbDesc:
Limb Module Description:

This module creates a limb rig
with clavicle+elbow+wrist for an arm type
or anc+knee+ankle for a leg type.
There is the option to reOrient controls
that is useful to aim clavicle to shoulder and
align the wrist to the elbow.

This module works fine in IK or FK with strecth.
It also have a good integration with Foot module.
m025_footDesc:
Foot Module Description:

This module creates a foot rig
with reverse foot system.
It works fine when integrated with leg type of a limb module.
m027_bipedDesc:
Biped Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic biped guide,
with all modules already parented using the correct mirror settings
and a good name convention...

You just need to place the guides in the correct location
and press the RIG all button (the green button).
m029_armDesc:
Arm Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic arm guide,
with fingers parented to an arm type of a limb module.
m031_legDesc:
Leg Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic leg guide,
with foot parented to a leg type of a limb module.
m038_quadrupedDesc:
Quadruped Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic quadruped guide,
with leg type limb modules parented to spine,
 a head module, a simple tail and ear using Fk Line.
m050_matchMeshDesc:
Useful tool to transfer mesh information.
You can use it to update
a Blend Shape target.
m052_headDefDesc:
Create an arrow control to use
a squash and bends
to deform a mesh, usually as a Blend Shape target or in a lattice.
m054_printSelDesc:
Will print the selection as list and string
in order to help to update the
geometry and control lists
in the Master_Ctrl.
m056_tgtMirrorDesc:
Will create a mirrored copy of the selected targets.
Please, select first the original (not deformed) mesh,
and after the targets to be mirrored.
m058_updateRigInfoDesc: Will update geometry and control lists in the Master_Ctrl.
m060_limbSpaceSwitchDesc: Will add the IK follow attribute to Limbs in a biped setup.
m062_zipperDesc: Will create a zipper setup, usually used for sticky lips.
m064_eyeDesc:
Will create eye look at controls and setup, try to integrate head control.
We can automaticaly add eyelids, iris and pupil setup.
m065_selOrigAction: Select first the original node (father) and then the action (child) node, please
m066_selectTwo: Select 2 items to calculate them interactions, please.
m069_correctionManagerDesc:
Create all the nodes needed for a Pose System.
First choose the node we want to extract the rotation.
Second, choose the node from which we will extract the rotation
so that we get the rotation of the first node from the second one
m074_singleDesc:
Description to Single module:

This module will create just an alone joint
that we can use it with very simple rigs
our to facial rigs with the Indirect Skinning option
if we want pass it throu a blendShape target.
If the Holder option is on, we won't have the control shape.
m082_tweaksDesc:
Create Single modules and parent them
in order to get a good Facial Tweaks setup
to use as indirect skinning or final facial joints.
m084_rivetDesc:
Create a Rivet setup to make controls follow a geometry mesh. We can use it for Tweaks
on a character face, for example.

There are some options like:
Back = to avoid double transformations,
Attach transform,
And it can be easly integrated to scalable Rigs.
m086_facialConnectionDesc: Directly connect controllers to blendShapes or facial joints.
m088_reoderAttrDesc:
Create a very useful tool to easily
reorder attributes in Maya channel box.

We need just select the attribute
and press Up or Down buttons.
m096_isolateDesc:
This script will create an Isolate setup.
Need 3 nodes selected
or it'll use the Root_Ctrl.
m098_confirmSelectAny:
There are a lot of node types in the scene.
It may take a long time to select all of them.
Do you want to continue?
m099_cvControlDesc:
This class will create a curve shape
in order to be used as a control.
m136_copyPasteAttrDesc:
Copy and Paste selected attributes
from the firt selected oject
to other selected objects.
m139_facialCtrlsAttr: Facial controls and attributes to create:
m141_createTargetsDesc: It'll create the blendShape targets from a default list duplicating and renaming the selected mesh.
m142_connectFacialAttr: Connect the Head facial controllers to:
m150_avoidDoubleTransf: Add invert setup to avoid double transformation
m154_suspensionDesc:
Suspension Module Description:

Create a Suspension setup using
2 joints and aim constraints.
m157_wheelDesc:
Module Description:

Create a Wheel setup
with an auto rotate expression.
m159_steeringDesc:
Module Description:

Create a Steering Wheel setup
useful to integrate to Wheel module.
m164_carDesc:
Car Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic car guide,
with all modules already parented using the correct mirror settings
and a good name convention...

You just need to place the guides in the correct location
and press the RIG all button (the green button).

You also can change it to get
other type of vehicles.
m166_bikeDesc:
Bike Script Description:

This scripted module creates a basic bike guide,
with all modules already parented using the correct mirror settings
and a good name convention...

You just need to place the guides in the correct location
and press the RIG all button (the green button).

You also can change it a bit
in order to get a motorcycle Rig.
m169_noItemSelect: No items selected, please select an item to remove.
m176_noseDesc:
Nose Module Description:

This module creates some integrated joints
as a bunch of FkLines to be used
in the face as a nose for characters.
m179_chainDesc:
Chain Module Description:

This module creates a joint chain
with the number of joints desired.

Different from FkLine, when it's rigged, the controls will be FK (forward kinematics) or
iK (inverse kinematics).

We can choose if the switch attributes will be in Option_Ctrl
or at the base control.
m187_updateGuidesDesc:
Check for old version guides and
try to update for the new ones.
m188_noGuidesToUpdate: There is no guides to update.
m192_askOldGuides:
Everything worked well.
We recommend delete old guides.
m197_notPossibleParent: It was not possible to parent
m206_mergeNamespace: Imported guides namespace merged with root
m213_customAttrDesc:
This tool is designed to create, edit or remove
useful custom attributes for the
dpAutoRigSystem.
m215_renamerDesc:
Renamer Module Description:

This module is useful to rename nodes in the scene.
m231_proxyCreatorDesc: This module will generate a proxy mesh for the current rig.
m234_jointDisplayDesc: Change the joint display in the viewport
p001_prefixText: Attention: The prefix text cannot start with number, whitespace or have special characters, sorry.
r004_modelIODesc:
This action will work with modeling geometries used in the rig.
I'll export or import alembic files.
r009_shaderIODesc:
This action will work with shading in the geometries.
I'll export or import json files to rebuild
the simple color shaders and
connect them to the meshes.
r010_notFoundPath: Not found pathIO to export or import data in the current pipeline, sorry.
r011_notFoundMesh: Not found meshes to apply the imported shaders, sorry.
r013_guideIODesc:
This action will work with guides
exporting and importing json files from network nodes.
r015_controlShapeIODesc:
This action will work with controller shapes
exporting and importing ma files from snapshot curves.
r017_skinningIODesc:
This action will work with skinning
exporting and importing json files for the deformer weights.
r020_parentingIODesc:
This action will work with parenting,
exporting and importing json files
to rebuild the transform hierarchy.
r022_checkinIODesc:
This action will work with check
the imported model using defined validators like:
dpUnlockNormals, dpSoftenEdges, dpFreezeTransform and dpGeometryHistory.
r024_supportNodeIODesc:
This action will work with geometries and curves used in the setup
exporting and importing them from groups like:
BlendShape_Grp, Support_Grp, FX_Grp and WIP_Grp.
r026_newSceneIODesc:
This action will work with new scene file
based on the asset name context
to start a clear maya scene to run the rebuilding.
r027_noAssetContext: There's no configured asset context to rebuild it, sorry.
r029_rigItIODesc:
This action will call the main method to
create the rig setup for all existing guides.
r031_blendShapeIODesc:
This action will work with blendShape targets
exporting and importing them data.
r034_deformationIODesc:
This action will work with deformer nodes
exporting and importing them data.
r036_inputOrderIODesc:
This action will work with deformer order
exporting and importing them lists.
r038_transformationIODesc:
This action will work with transformations
exporting and importing them data.
r040_rivetIODesc:
This action will work with rivets
exporting and importing them data.
r042_calibrationIODesc:
This action will work with controllers calibration
exporting and importing them data.
r044_attributeIODesc:
This action will work with controllers attributes
exporting and importing them userDefined data.
r046_connectionIODesc:
This action will work with connected nodes and attributes
exporting and importing them info to rebuild them.
r047_notConnectedUC: There's a not connected unitConversion node.
r049_componentTagIODesc:
This action will work with componentTag info
exporting and importing them data.
r051_constraintIODesc:
This action will work with constraints
exporting and importing them data.
r053_drivenKeyIODesc:
This action will work with set driven key nodes
exporting and importing them data.
r055_utilityIODesc:
This action will work with utility nodes
exporting and importing them data.
r057_renameIODesc:
This action will work with renamed nodes
exporting and importing them data.
r059_deleteData:
It'll delete the rebuilding exported data.
It is not undoable, sorry.
Do you want to continue?
r062_offsetMatrixIODesc:
This action will work with offset parent matrix
exporting and importing them connections info.
r063_maybeDoneIO:
Maybe this module didn't worked well.
Not possible to surely define it, sorry
r065_channelIODesc:
This action will work with the tranform attributes
exporting and importing them info as locked, hidden or non keyable
for default attributes as translate, rotate, scale and visibility.
r066_shapeToReplace: Is this a shape to be replaced?
r069_noAssetToSaveVersion:
Seems we don't have a valid asset setup yet, sorry.

You can create a new one or load an existing asset before continue.
If you prefer, save you scene in the pipeline before continue, please.
r071_visibilityIODesc:
This action will work with the visibility attribute
exporting and importing its info.
r072_noReferenceAllowed: It isn't possible to continue the process because there are referenced files in the scene, sorry.
t001_greeting:
Thank you for your help in this project.

Before start sentence translation,
we need to collect some info
in order to complete the file...
t004_websiteContact: What's your website, if you have one?
t005_langName: Which language will you translate to?
t007_writeText:
Please, write the translated text here
or click Same button in order to use the text above.
t008_finishMessage:
Thank you very much for your help!
It's really appreciated.
t009_finishButton:
Translate this last sentence
then click Finish button, please.
v002_templateDesc:
Template description to check if there's
a _Mesh suffix.
v010_wipCleanerDesc:
Check if there are any node inside
of the WIP_Grp and delete them.
v011_notWIP: Not found WIP_Grp to clean it up, sorry.
v013_targetCleanerDesc:
Check if there are blendShape primary
targets to clean them up.
It'll delete not connected or not deformed geometries.
v014_notFoundNodes: Not found nodes to continue, sorry.
v016_freezeTranformDesc:
Check if all geometries have frozen transformations, translate,
rotate values at zero and scale values at one,
otherwise try to apply them.
v020_publishStopped: Publishing process stopped... check this validator please:
v021_noFileName: There isn't a publish file name to save the file, sorry.
v022_noFilePath: There isn't a publishing path to save the file, sorry.
v025_duplicatedNameDesc:
Check if there are any node with
duplicated name and report them.
v027_ngskintoolsCleanerDesc: This validator will clean-up all ngSkinTools custom nodes forever.
v029_hideDataGrpDesc: This validator will hide the Data_Grp if it isn't hidden yet.
v031_colorSetCleanerDesc:
This validator will clean-up all colorSet nodes
when Shape Editor and sculpt tools is used.
v033_resetPoseDesc: This validator will reset the rig to its default pose.
v035_exitEditModeDesc:
This validator will check if there any corrective
controller in the edit mode and
it'll back to normal state without save changes
or settings.
v037_hideCorrectivesDesc: This validator will lock and hide the corrective attribute on Option_Ctrl
v039_namespaceCleanerDesc:
Check if there are namespaces to clean them up.
It won't delete namespace from dpGuides.
v041_keyframeCleanerDesc:
This validator will delete the animated objects keyframes.
It won't check drivenKeys, blendWeights or pairBlends.
v043_importReferenceDesc: This validator will check if there are referenced file to import them up.
v045_sideCalibrationDesc:
This validator will detect if there're some
controllers with different side calibration
and priorize the setup from the non defaultValue
or use the left side as source if the two sides are configured.
v047_brokenNetCleanerDesc:
This validator will detect if there're some
broken correction manager network to clean-up them.
v049_unlockIniShadGrpDesc:
This validator will unlock the InitialShadingGroup
to avoid the blocking to just create a
simple polyCube.
v051_showBPCleanerDesc: This validator will delete the ShowBP scriptNodes.
v053_vaccineCleanerDesc: This validator will desinfect the vaccine virus.
v055_displayLayersDesc: This validator will create the default Display Layers.
v059_unknownNodesCleanerDesc: This validator will clean-up the unknown nodes in the scene.
v061_controlsHierarchyDesc:
Check if controls hierarchy match
with a previous state exported,
to prevent animation loss.
v063_firstHierarchy: This is the first hierarchy version. OK
v065_addedSonOf: was added to the hierarchy, son of
v070_duplicateName: Possible duplicated item on nodes hierarchy:
v072_geometryHistoryDesc: This validator will clean-up the geometry deformer history.
v074_controllerTagDesc: This validator tag as controller all dpControls.
v077_outlinerCleanerDesc:
This validator will clean-up the dpAutoRigSystem not used nodes in the outliner.
It's useful to delete garbages from deleted guides,
for example dpAR_GuideMirror_Grp.
v079_unlockNormalsDesc: This validator will unlock normals from the geometries.
v083_unusedSkinCleanerDesc: This validator will remove unused skin influences.
v085_unusedNodeCleanerDesc: This validator will remove unecessary rendering nodes.
v087_invertedNormalsDesc: This validator will verify inverted normals in the geometries.
v089_softenEdgesDesc: This validator will verify soften edges in the geometries.
v091_overrideCleanerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are nodes with overrides
and remove them.
v093_unlockAttributesDesc: This validator will verify and unlock attributes.
v095_envelopeCheckerDesc: This validator check for envelope attributes lower than one.
v097_cleanupDesc: This validator check for dpDeleteIt attributes and delete their nodes.
v098_askUserChooseFile:
Now we have two rigging files:

1 - WIP = work in progress
2 - Published = validated

Which file do you want to open?
v099_cantExistsAllGrp: We can't validate scenes with built All_Grp, sorry.
v100_cantExistsGuides: We can't validate scenes with guides, sorry.
v102_nonManifoldCleanerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are polygons
with non-manifold issues and remove them.
v104_pruneSkinWeightsDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
small skinning weights to prune.
v106_cycleCheckerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
cycle errors in the scene.
It'll only verify and let us know about it
because this theme is very complex to fix automatically
at the moment, sorry.
v108_passthroughAttributesDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
attributes with no necessary inbetween connections.
If so, it'll change (a -> b -> c) to (a -> c).
v110_scalableDeformerCheckerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
deformers with scalable connections in the scene.
It'll check and fix the scalable connections
to deformers: skinCluster and deltaMush.
v112_jointEndCleanerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
unnecessary joints at the end of the chains.
If so, it'll delete them because they aren't useful to animation.
v114_bindPoseCleanerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are
bindPose nodes in the scene.
If so, it'll delete them and create just
a new one node for all skinned joints.
v116_hideAllJointsDesc: This validator will hide joints in the scene.
v118_colorPerVertexCleanerDesc: This validator will remove polyColorPerVertex nodes in the scene.
v120_nonQuadFaceDesc:
This validator will find non quad polygon faces.
It won't be possible to fix it automatically, sorry.
v121_sharePythonSelect: Please share with modelers this Python command to select the identified:
v123_borderGapDesc:
This validator will find borders or holes in the mesh.
It won't be possible to if it automatically, sorry.
But you can try to use the fill hole Maya command to try fix it.
v125_laminaFaceCleanerDesc:
This validator will verify if there are some lamina faces in the meshes.
It'll cleanup them.
v133_oneVertexDesc:
This validator will verify if there are some non manifold vertex in the meshes.
That means a vertex in the union of 2 shapes.
